item.title: By: Tikitakatechy
item.dc:creator: Tikitakatechy
item.description:
Hey Martha.
What a fantastic idea.
I definitely suffer from poor recall of everything from major project i have worked on to what i had for breakfast yesterday. I'll start a daily list myself, see if it can jog my memory.
item.content:encoded:
Hey Martha.

What a fantastic idea.

I definitely suffer from poor recall of everything from major project i have worked on to what i had for breakfast yesterday. I’ll start a daily list myself, see if it can jog my memory.
